front.title: Signaling and Encapsulation for the Transport of IP over L2TPv3

abstract.t: The Layer 2 Tunneling Protocol, Version 3, (L2TPv3) defines a protocol for tunneling a variety of data link protocols over IP networks. This document defines the control messaging, signaling procedures and encapsulation specifics of how to tunnel IPv4 and IPv6 packets directly over L2TPv3.
